snippet: The strikes in Surt were part of a new military campaign against the Sunni terrorist group’s stronghold in North Africa, the Pentagon said....
abstract: United States conducts airstrikes in Libya, stepping up its war against Islamic State.

byline.contributor: Eric Schmitt contributed reporting from Washington, Declan Walsh from New York, and Suliman Ali Zway from Berlin.

lead_paragraph: The strikes in Surt were part of a new military campaign against the Sunni terrorist group’s stronghold in North Africa, the Pentagon said.

headline.main: U.S. Conducts Airstrikes Against ISIS in Libya
headline.print_headline: Stepping Up the Fight Against ISIS, U.S. Conducts Airstrikes in Libya

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
